page.title: 05OUR CHURCH
page.content: Edenham Church is dedicated to St.Michael and all Angels.It is rather big and there is a Vicarage at the back.Walking through the gate you can see tomb stones and Cedar trees and sometimes people mourning.As you come into the Church itself there is a door on the right leading up into the towers.In front there is an open door (shut at night) which leads to the main room.There are stained glass windows to:St.Catherine,St. Paul,the Apostles,St.Michael and all Angels and Jesus.In September to October people donate some of their crops to the Church and then the food is delivered to the elderly.Sometimes the ten bells peal out.The organ was repaired too.A lady called Miss.B.Stainsby plays it when we use it.There is a Sunday School each Sunday.Our vicar is leaving in July.
